title: Yuka App Ultimate Review 2023: A Smart and Simple Way to Eat and Shop Healthier
review_html:
Yuka app is a mobile application that allows you to scan the barcodes of your food and cosmetic products and get instant ratings and information about their health impact. Yuka app was launched in 2017 in France by a team of four entrepreneurs who wanted to help consumers make better choices for their health and the environment. Yuka app has since become one of the most popular health apps in Europe, with over 30 million users and 1.5 million products in its database. Yuka app is available for free on Android and iOS devices, and supports multiple languages, such as English, French, Spanish, and Italian. In this article, we will evaluate Yuka app‚Äôs pros and cons, features and functionalities, and customer service.

‚úÖ Pros

It provides clear and objective ratings and information for your products, based on scientific criteria and independent sources.

It uses a simple and intuitive color-coded system, with green for excellent, yellow for good, orange for mediocre, and red for bad.

It explains the reasons behind the ratings, highlighting the positive and negative aspects of each product, such as nutrients, additives, allergens, ingredients, or environmental impact.

It suggests healthier alternatives for your products, with similar characteristics but better ratings.

It helps you track your consumption habits and progress, with statistics, graphs, and personalized advice.

It educates you on various health and nutrition topics, with articles, videos, and quizzes.

¬†

‚ùé Cons

It may not have all the products in its database, especially if they are new, rare, or from other countries.

It may not have accurate or updated information for some products, due to changes in the formulas, labels, or regulations.

It may not take into account your personal needs, preferences, or allergies, as it gives general ratings and recommendations for the average consumer.

It may not be compatible with some devices, operating systems, or barcode scanners, which may affect its performance and functionality.

It may have security and privacy issues, such as data collection, sharing, or protection, which may require your consent and caution.

¬†

‚ú® Features and Functionalities of Yuka App

Yuka app has a simple and elegant design, with a white and green color scheme and a minimalist layout. The app is easy to use, with a bottom menu bar that contains four tabs: Scan, History, Profile, and More. The Scan tab allows you to scan the barcodes of your products and get instant ratings and information. The History tab allows you to view your scanned products and their ratings, and sort them by date, category, or score. The Profile tab allows you to access your account, settings, statistics, and advice. The More tab allows you to discover more features and content, such as articles, videos, quizzes, and settings.
¬†
The app is fast and smooth, with quick loading and scanning, and minimal lagging or freezing. The app is also responsive and adaptive, with a suitable layout and size for different devices and orientations. The app is compatible with Android and iOS devices, and requires an internet connection and a camera to function.
¬†
The app is also functional and interactive, with various features and options that enhance the health and nutrition experience. Some of the features and options are:

1. Scan: You can scan the barcodes of your products and get instant ratings and information, such as pictures, descriptions, scores, and details. You can also select the size, quantity, and flavor of the product, and add it to your history or favorites.

2. History: You can view your scanned products and their ratings, and sort them by date, category, or score. You can also edit or delete your products, and compare them with other products.

3. Profile: You can access your account, settings, statistics, and advice. You can also edit your personal information, such as your name, email, password, gender, age, weight, height, and activity level. You can also view your statistics, such as your average score, your consumption habits, and your progress. You can also get personalized advice, such as your daily calorie intake, your recommended nutrient intake, and your tips to improve your health.

4. More: You can discover more features and content, such as articles, videos, quizzes, and settings. You can also access the help center, where you can find answers to frequently asked questions, or contact the customer service.

‚òéÔ∏è Customer Service of Yuka App

Yuka app has a friendly and helpful customer service team, that strives to provide satisfactory and timely solutions to its users. You can contact the customer service via email at [email¬†protected], or via the contact form on the app or the website. The customer service is available from Monday to Friday, from 9 am to 6 pm (Paris time), and responds within 24 hours, depending on the issue and the demand. The customer service is also courteous and respectful, and listens to your concerns and requests.
¬†
The customer service can help you with various issues, such as:

1. Product Issues: You can contact the customer service if you have any problems with your products, such as missing, wrong, or outdated information, or incorrect or incomplete ratings. The customer service will verify the information and update the database as soon as possible.

2. App Issues: You can contact the customer service if you have any problems with the app, such as technical glitches, performance issues, or functionality errors. The customer service will investigate the issue and resolve it as soon as possible.

3. Account Issues: You can contact the customer service if you have any problems with your account, such as login errors, password resets, account verification, or account deletion. The customer service will assist you in accessing and managing your account, and protect your personal and financial information.

4. Other Issues: You can contact the customer service if you have any other issues or questions, such as feature requests, feedback, or suggestions. The customer service will provide you with relevant and accurate information, and appreciate your feedback and suggestions.

¬†

üõé Conclusion

Yuka app is a smart and simple way to eat and shop healthier, by scanning and analyzing your food and cosmetic products and giving you clear and objective ratings and information. However, Yuka app also has some limitations, such as incomplete or inaccurate database, general ratings and recommendations, and security and privacy concerns. Therefore, you should weigh the pros and cons of Yuka app before deciding whether to use it or not.
